void requestOrSendPDPContextListQMI ( RIL_Token *  t  ) 

Sends PDP context information to the RIL based on a solicited request or an unsolicited event.

Parameters:
[in] t Pointer to theRIL token
Returns:
none
Abort:
none
Note:
Returns the data call list. An entry is added when a RIL_REQUEST_SETUP_DATA_CALL is issued and removed on a RIL_REQUEST_DEACTIVATE_DATA_CALL. The list is emptied when RIL_REQUEST_RADIO_POWER off/on is issued.
void requestPDPContextListQMI ( void *  data,
size_t  datalen,
RIL_Token  t 
)

RIL_REQUEST_PDP_CONTEXT_LIST.

Queries the status of PDP contexts, returning for each its CID, whether or not it is active, and its PDP type, APN, and PDP adddress.

int retrievePDPRejectCauseQMI ( ULONG  qmicode  ) 

Convert the last PDP activation error code into a RIL error code and store it in the global variable.

Returns:
0 - successfully retrieved error code -1 - otherwise
Abort:
none
Note:
